website_summaries.verdict: Feel comfort and relief on the go with this travel-ready heated massager and its carrying case.
pros: 4 buttons for easy operation in an accessible location
Bidirectional kneading nodes for deep, focused massage
Grips are soft and large enough for hands or forearms
cons: Given its improved design and travel accessories, it’s a bit pricier than some models

customer_reviews.title: Great massager
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase. My boyfriend is beyond thrilled with it. I have used a few different neck massagers before, and this is my favorite. I have bad pain and numbness in my back and neck from having a desk job. This is the first one that has really helped relieve the tension. The handles have helped more than I thought they would in being able to get a full back massage. It has multiple modes and speeds, and you can turn the heat off and on depending on what you want. I also love that it comes with a car charger and carrying bag. I plan on purchasing at least 2 more as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Breanna Lee

customer_reviews.title: Feels great!
customer_reviews.text: First of all-day this is a 5 star massager for the way it feels on my neck and shoulders. I love it! But....in less than 1 week I heard rattling when using on my shoulder. This turned out to be 2 screws that came out of massager heads. It's so worth fixing because other than that- this is the best message I've owned!!!
customer_reviews.author: SET

customer_reviews.title: Great for neck.
customer_reviews.text: This is GREAT for use your neck but you will have a heck of a time keeping it in place with the right amount of pressure anywhere else AND relaxing at the same time. UPDATE: 20180916 The vendor contacted me and offered to work with me to find a way to use the massager more successfully on my lower back. I have had some success so I am raising my rating by one star. I’m going to keep working at it and will give another update in a week or two.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: Puts the massage action where you need it.
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased to prevent neck muscle tightness which can lead to severe headaches. I suffer from chronic headaches and fibromyalgia. Medications seem to have side effects that are not compatible with quality of life. With this massager I can sit down on the couch and get a massage that rivals a therapist. Thanks to the "arms" I can easily put the messaging action where I need it and also increase and decrease the pressure. It is very well designed and I look forward to using it on automobile trips. My husband is a physician and athlete and he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: After few several use, it's already not working.
customer_reviews.text: This product is sub-standard. I really like the aesthetic look of the machine and the accompanying bag, but the item is poorly made. It's already not working after I've used it for around a week or more.
customer_reviews.author: JESSROCKED

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: The product wasn't quite what I was looking for but their customer service is amazing, so if you're not satisfied, you will be taken care of. thanks Ted!
customer_reviews.author: Laurlowski

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! Awesome customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing massager. I used to spend $60+ on a massage every month but now I have a great massager for my sore neck and back anytime I want! I save money and it's convenient. I also would like to point out that the seller and customer service were incredible. They reached out to me to make sure that I knew they were available if I had any questions regarding my new massager. They also provided great service and were very kind and accommodating when I had a concern regarding the product. I highly recommend this product and loved their customer loyalty and appreciation!!
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Great massager. Does NOT hurt.
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price. Cant push all that much pressure with out it sounding broken. Glad inread the reviews. Definitely do not get who thinks this thing is painful. I cant get enough from it. Im 5 foot and 110 lbs. not painful at all. It works really well on certain parts and works on other than back body parts. Like arms legs hips. Dont get this deep massager if your not able to take deep massage. Thats how to solve the pain issue.
customer_reviews.author: monica

customer_reviews.title: what a ripoff!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as gift for my wife and she doesn’t like it because it’s very rough and painful. what a ripoff. do no buy! 😠
customer_reviews.author: jessie

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality product
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. Initially, it was helpful, esp on the neck and shoulders however the product stopped working after about a month. Totally disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: What an AWESOME product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a similar product from another manufacturer and sent it back, as the heat function didn't work. I was looking for one for my Darling Bride, who has a lot of problems with fibromyalgia and muscle tension. I can't say how utterly thrilled she is with this! And I'm thrilled with the company, its communication with us and product support. She loves the adjustable pressure, the heat and her ability to move it wherever she hurts. It comes with a car adapter, so she can get her Shiatsu massage on the go! In summary, we couldn't be more pleased. Resteck is located in AMERICA... not only do we love supporting American business, we love their product! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: The_Chief

customer_reviews.title: Damaged massager
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this product in December and it just stopped working about two days ago is it possible for me to get a replacement?
customer_reviews.author: sophia charlemagne

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!! Instant relief and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: This product is truly amazing. I have had chronic neck/back pain and knots for so long and nothing seemed to help, until I used this!! After just one use I already felt a difference. I now use it often and have had significant relief. I love it! I would highly recommend this product!! WELL worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: bad
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed, used in the back but it’s so painful.
customer_reviews.author: fireball

customer_reviews.title: This is a rough, stiff, torture unit.
customer_reviews.text: It was stiff and sounded like styrofoam in my ears. It was most uncomfortable to lean my neck into. When the motion started it jabbed me on both sides of my neck three times in one minute. The box had been opened and was torn on one end. It looked like it had been used or sent back.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Great massager but.....
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mainly for my husband because I had seen one like it on QVC but they were out. I still think it is exactly like the other one that I wanted to buy, THERE SEEMS TO BE NOTHING WRONG WITH THE QUALITY OF THE PRODUCT. However that being said it is awkward to use, it is uncomfortable when you try to sit back in your chair and put it where it massages your neck. So when my husband uses it he has to sit up in his chair and keep it propped up on his neck, hence the awkwardness. Otherwise this product is as described and shipped super fast and well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: C Hill

customer_reviews.title: Heat mode doesn't work!
customer_reviews.text: This massager works well on my neck . A bit awkward on shoulders. My biggest problem is the heat mode not working and it is hard to tell the different levels on the control panel. Contacted the company about the heat problem and the owner said it is made to be low heat so the machine does't overheat. Mine doesn't even get lukewarm. The owner completely disappeared after asking for my order number from Amazon. Not a great customer service. I feel like I should have bought from a bigger company with proven customer service. Thinking about returning it since I'd like the option of the heat mode.
customer_reviews.author: sy

customer_reviews.title: Came apart - don't buy this
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: The company has done good job of addressing the issue. They sent a replacement unit quickly and so far it seems to be working better. Stay tuned. The massager came apart when the screws came off of the massage heads. The massage heads are also way too hard. They need to have a more resilient surface. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: TMF

customer_reviews.title: A Company With Great Service
customer_reviews.text: After using this a few times, my wife decided that the massager was just not for her. I discovered that the return time frame had expired but the manufacturer reached out to me and went above and beyond to refund our money. The massager may not have been what my wife needed, but the company has my admiration.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery.
customer_reviews.text: Was delivered on time as promised. I have chronic neck and back problems. It has helped a lot. Was recommended by my back doctor. The only I have is that the heat takes while to get warm and there is no light to show that the heat is on.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: It's good but not sure about great?
customer_reviews.text: I gave in cuz I needed relief fast from everything aching. It feels good when you sit up with the device pinned against your neck or back, but not that great in any other position and doesn't feel so good that I feel relief. If I loosen up even just a little then there's no pressure to my neck. I mean, obviously, that's what the straps are for, but I didn't realize how much work I'd have to put in to feel something.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Sold a repacked product like it was new
customer_reviews.text: There is a sticker over the seal that says “if seal is broken this item is unsellable”. It is placed over an identical sticker with a broken seal. This really unscrupulous.
customer_reviews.author: Adam J

customer_reviews.title: Breaks easy
customer_reviews.text: Ordered one and broke after a couple weeks. I got a replacement but that one broke in a few months:(
customer_reviews.author: RICHARD MURPHY

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great Until It Didn't
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Father's Day gift for my husband and it was great until it stopped working after about 6 months. For over $50, I would expect it to work longer. It got some sort of short and worked off and on for a few months and now it won't even turn on.
customer_reviews.author: Lily Alexander

customer_reviews.title: A great product
customer_reviews.text: I've never needed a massager before but lately I've been suffering from neck and shoulder pain caused mostly by stress. I looked at many different types on Amazon but liked the features of the Resteck the best. I'm glad I did. After the first use I felt much better and continued to improve with each use. Using the hand hold straps allows you to put the massaging heads right where they need to be. The variable heat settings help as well. I strongly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders
customer_reviews.text: This massager has helped with the knots in my shoulders muscles and I have less headaches since I have been using this. The only thing I have found uncomfortable is trying to sit in a relaxing position.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: My worst shopping experience
customer_reviews.text: The product is terrible. Only use twice, the massager does not work.
customer_reviews.author: funny

customer_reviews.title: Total piece of junk Never worked when it was delivered
customer_reviews.text: I bought this POS and Right when i got it I plugged it in to charge it and it was dead from the start. I have tried to return it and because I was out of town missed the return date and they will not take it back. I will suggest you stay as far away from this company and product, unless your feeling like tossing away 50 bucks
customer_reviews.author: Chase Blackstone

customer_reviews.title: DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. This stopped working (purchased in July)...no longer powers on. Very disappointing. Too bad it's too late for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Lawanda King

customer_reviews.title: A Great Purchase For Us.  Highly Recommend.
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this massager for my wife who was suffering from neck and back pain. She has been TOTALLY happy with our purchase of this massager. A key word in my first sentence is that she WAS suffering. She is feeling much better thanks to the massager.
customer_reviews.author: Jim17

customer_reviews.title: What a great portable massager
customer_reviews.text: I would go see a licensed massage therapist on a very regular basis, which can be expensive. After my go-to massage therapist canceled on me last minute, I went searching for a less expensive and more reliable option, and I found it in the RESTECK portable massager. Truth be told, I was skeptical when I ordered it, but I am no longer a skeptic. This massager works great on the back, neck, and shoulders, which is why I bought it. I use this massager on a regular basis, and in fact, I haven’t had a professional massage since I received it. Do yourself a favor and buy one of these, you won’t regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Tom D.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I am happy that this is a complete kit including AC power adapter,Car power adapter and that it comes in an easy carry bag,In addition to the massager. I love that it is easy to use and has a timer feature, which enables me to set it up for one button start and then let it run until it’s done. You can set it to massage in both forward and reverse directions if wanted. I am well satisfied! I have used it primarily for my neck and shoulders. It can be used in forward and reverse automatically for 15 minutes continuously by pressing a button.
customer_reviews.author: F. Holcomb

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to relieve neck and shoulder pain that I've had for 3+ months or so.. at first, i loved it. It felt amazing and even gave me goosebumps! But after unresolved neck issues, i realized it was hurting more than helping. The pressure needed to hold it in place ended up making me stay tense instead of relaxing. After using it, the next day my neck would feel worse. But i kept using it. Had a real massage three days ago and WOW what a difference. I wish i hadnt missed the refund window or i would've returned it to pay for my next one. I don't doubt it helps some people, just not me.
customer_reviews.author: michele

customer_reviews.title: Did the job ... but lasted a few hours!!!
customer_reviews.text: The was certainly helping me but it stopped working within a few hours after 2 uses.
customer_reviews.author: Wozza

customer_reviews.title: Awful, painful, uncomfortable, awkward to use, ugh...returned immediately, very disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: Awful, painful, uncomfortable, awkward to use, ugh...returned immediately, very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother!
customer_reviews.text: An absolute waste of money! The balls are too hard and cause pain as they roll across the area to be relieved. The package says it can’t be returned once the seal is broken. So how do you try the machine without breaking the package seal. When I emailed the company I got zip for a return.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service and Product!
customer_reviews.text: So I originally gave this a 1 out of 5 after it broke 30 seconds into the first use. Amazon was great at replacing it in just a couple days. I even received a recently Email from the company asking what they can do to fix the situation. The massager has been great now that it's been replaced and it seems to be very good quality. I must have gotten a dud which happens, nobodies perfect and the way the customer service came in and they fixed the issue is absolutely amazing. I would recommend this so far!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Resteck
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: The owner of Resteck stood behind his product and replaced my broken one. Because he is so passionate about his products I am more than willing to give this great massager another try. Thank YOU Resteck. Dave UPDATE 2: Unfortunately the second one broke within a few months as well. I'm pretty disappointed because I like the way it massages. It's just not made strong. What has happened twice is the gears that rotate the nodes get stripped.
customer_reviews.author: David R. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Knots Free!!!
customer_reviews.text: I a fitness junkie. I lift weights, do Taekwondo & play golf. So my body is always in need of some love. I would normally pay to get a massage once a month, but that can become costly. And since I’m so active I needed something that I could use whenever I wanted and not have to pay an masseuse to take care of. So I researched and found this massager and I’m obsessed. This massager takes out my knots and keeps me going when my body is tight. It’s so good that even my 10 year old son uses it. It’s also a great price point and I don’t see myself going to a masseuse anytime soon.
customer_reviews.author: ALPHA B.

customer_reviews.title: True Product Review
customer_reviews.text: So I was very skeptical because I hadn't done a lot of research into these. This product is unreal. My sister and I thought it would be just another product that would break after a few uses but after a month+ of using it multiple times a day, this product was well worth the $50 price tag. If you have chronic neck/back pain, nab this for the same price as a massage and you wont regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Amidei

customer_reviews.title: Customer support bad, product defective TWICE
customer_reviews.text: I got my first unit, and the AC adapter did not sit in the massager. So, it would turn itself off constantly because the plug fell out. I emailed Restek directly JUST LIKE THE LITTLE PAPER SAYS, and they straight up told me "we don't support amazon, sorry." I contacted Amazon and they sent me a SECOND unit, and it has the EXACT same problem. Clearly a PoS from china, I can't wait to return this garbage and find the quality original one. What a waste of my time.
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Motor is too weak to be of much use
customer_reviews.text: This is weaker than my smaller massage pillow. It stops moving as I lean back on it. Also, the cord falls out, which is a peeve of mine with this and similar products. Having the cord detach where it does is smart, but the connector strength is extremely low. The cord is also too short, but even with an extension cord, you'll still have issues. The bottom line is you WILL unplug yourself when you move/stretch... it's just a given and I'm sure everyone who uses this product deals with this. They could do so much better by having a firmer connector and a longer power adapter.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: An at home massage!
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this neck and back massager after reading a few online reviews. I was so excited when it arrived, I anxiously opened the package to try it out! Great massager at a great price point. I typically use this product every night after long days at work. It has the ability to massage your neck, lower back, and legs (although I use the leg feature infrequently) My neck and back muscles feel great the next day and I am ready to face another day on my feet. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS
customer_reviews.text: I tried it at a friends for 10 minutes and walked around at the amusement park and beach for 6 hrs and no lower back pain. I got home and bought my own. I have used it 3 days for 15 minutes and I'm amazed how much better I feel I brought it work and let 3 people try it...they love it . These are people in their 20's work in Aquatics and Fitness and front desk . They're backs get sore. I work at the YMCA in northern NJ . I love it because I have 2 herniated discs in my cervical and 1 in my thoracic and I feel great. Thank you Scott Schmidl
customer_reviews.author: scott j schmidl

customer_reviews.title: Helps migraines
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from chronic migraines, resulting from stiff, tight muscles in shoulder, especially neck area. After 3 or 4 cycles (15 mins/cycle), this massager relieves all knots and tension. My massage therapist whom I used to go to before this massager told me the primary reason for my headaches/migraines was from knots in neck muscles pressing on a nerve and preventing blood flow to brain. Prior to this brand which I got in 2018, I used to own Sonic Comfort ($150 at a wholesale club) which stopped working after less than few months. Another important note is Resteck excellent customer service. I trust and respect companies that stand behind their products. Sonic Comfort never responded to my questions/issue.
customer_reviews.author: Kalani

customer_reviews.title: Very average massager
customer_reviews.text: Didn't produce any heat to speak of .hard to keep in place. Massage heads not enough of or big enough . Fancy packaging maybe should put more into the device .
customer_reviews.author: Bradley W.

customer_reviews.title: Total Relief
customer_reviews.text: I wished I had found this neck massager sooner. I was hurting so bad from my Fibromyalgia that I could hard move. I received this within two days of ordering. It has made a huge difference and I was able to move my neck and shoulders after I started using this on a regular basis. I would definitely recommend this to anyone with neck and shoulder pain. I have even used in on my lower back. But it is so wonderful on the neck pain that I am able to get work done at home even when my back is hurting. This is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: yogie114

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great product, I loved it when it worked. I used this massager 2 times a week for a little over 2 months. Now it’s completely dead. Will not turn on. I don’t know how to get in contact with the seller to see if they will replace unit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of the best gifts you could give someone or to yourself
customer_reviews.text: As a busy mama with a lot of moving pieces to look after, a rarely have time to look after myself. If you are a parent, particularly during this pandemic and all that's come with it, you'll know exactly what I mean. This product has been a total game changer. The shiatsu style massage is so relaxing and luxurious - 10 minutes and I am ready to chase after my little guy again! My mother loves it and I've recommended it to my friends. If you have made a firm commitment to self-care or if you have back issues and you need a little extra care, don't hesitate - this is the massager for you.
customer_reviews.author: CT Pacifica

customer_reviews.title: BROKE WITHIN 3 USES - MADE IN CHINA
customer_reviews.text: What more is there to say? Thank goodness for Amazon because it would have cost me $60 Canadian to return the product to CHINA.
customer_reviews.author: CynthiaM

customer_reviews.title: It is important to know why you're buying this.
customer_reviews.text: This is a well-made product. It's beautifully design high quality however the downside is it heavy hard to use especially if you're a woman and slender. I used it the first day it felt great but it threw my back into all kinds of issues for the next 5 weeks. So if you have issues with your back already compressed disc shoulder issues I would suggest if you don't buy this item. If your backs in great shape and you want something just to give you a good workout and you're a guy this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: JUDY LIGHT HALL

customer_reviews.title: #1 RESTECK arrived with on/off switch not working returned for #2 it worked for 35 DAYS
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this product when it was working which was 35 days . I was going to return it but now I see it has a 30 day return. So I am not happy, that I can not return it. It was a great massager when it worked. I would like a refund, as it is obvious that these massagers have issues. Linda
customer_reviews.author: Linda Mayer

customer_reviews.title: Product smells
customer_reviews.text: It has a strong smell of vinyl and rubber. The cord is too easy to come unplugged
customer_reviews.author: J. Day

customer_reviews.title: Works but doesn't last long with regular use.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this massager since June and it worked well enough. I use it maybe 3-4 times per week and it has already torn open the covering material. If there is a way to replace the cover due to use I'd rate it higher. Overall it still functions but a bit difficult to use without a barrier between the massager and skin. Update 9/28/2020 The entire covering has worn through and I've been using a towel to cover the massage head. Unfortunately one of the massage heads has completely fallen off and putting it back on is temporary. This item is worth $20 tops considering it lasted barely 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Nimas

customer_reviews.title: Great massager but zero durability!
customer_reviews.text: It worked well for 3 months and then completely died on me. I can’t even get it to come on now. My husband used it a few times a week for an hour or so at a time, and it was great while it lasted. .... Maybe we just got a dud. :(
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Decent given price, but cord is a hassle.
customer_reviews.text: Usage too restrictive since it is corded. The locations I would use this are not convenient for plugging in. This is NOT a cordless device. Having an extension cord is a pain. Functionality is good for the price. I had a brookstone version that was about $200. It did a better job and was chargeable. It was used heavily by my whole family for 3 years until fabric finally got a whole in it. If these massagers were of comparable pricing, I would have given this 1 star. I think for the price point though, it is a good option for people that can make the plug in requirement work. I returned it though and have purchased another brookstone.
customer_reviews.author: CityLover

customer_reviews.title: Great relief for neck and back pain, but one issue...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after using a similar product at a friend's house. Suffering from tension headaches due to neck and upper back strain, these products can really help. Unfortunately, I feel this particular model suffers from somewhat weaker motors. Pulling on the device to apply more pressure, you can really hear the motors strain, and they eventually stop and reverse direction. I don't remember this problem with the other model my friend had. If they had stronger motors, I would easily give this product a 5/5.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Awkward to use for anything but shoulders
customer_reviews.text: Now obviously all of the commercials make everything easy to use. This device has you put your arms in 2 sleeves to put pressure where you want and lets you control how much pressure. The most awkward feature would be that you have to contort yourself in order to find a position that massages the other areas you may want massaged. The shoulders was easy, but the back is a little difficult and your thighs or calf muscles are probably just as difficult to maneuver. This also has to be plugged in for it to work. The cord is a decent length and they include a car charger.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great owner
customer_reviews.text: Read update below: This worked for maybe 15 operations and now won’t turn on at all. I bought it for my father and then Liked it enough to buy myself one. It worked great until it just stopped working. It has no indicator light if it’s charging... so maybe it’s the charger but how would I know? Update 5/16/20. So it was the charger. And the OWNER contacted me and he sent me a new one. So now my review changed to 5 stars. I love the massager and the owner stands behind the quality.... get this one.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Delcavo

customer_reviews.title: Works Great - Until it doesn't
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this massager for my mother for Christmas, she has chronic neck pain and she was really in love with it. Stopped working entirely out of the blue. Function is amazing when it's working, the straps are a huge help. Not sure if it was a bad egg but beware of potential quality issues and break down in a short period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: This is not rechargeable
customer_reviews.text: I like this for massage and heat combined . I was very very disappointed that it only runs when plugged in. All the picture show it being used free of the cord . This limits where I can use it because of the cord . I would return it but I hate doing that. I am going to try to work with it but will return if I can’t find someplace in my family room where I can sit with it plugged in .
customer_reviews.author: Pam Wagner

customer_reviews.title: It helps my chronic pain
customer_reviews.text: I experience constant chronic neck and shoulder pain, often accompanied by a headache. This self massager has really done wonders! It helps loosen and break up knots while providing heat. I couldn't be happier with it! Its also a plus that I can use it on other areas of my body. I also experience chronic pain in the glute area. Its always real awkward to tell the massage therapist to massage my butt! Now I can easily do it myself without that awkwardness! Do your body a favor, and treat yourself to this massager.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for muscle and tension relief!
customer_reviews.text: The features on this are great! Heat, change direction, change intensity. It works out the knots and tension in my trapezius. Drop it down a few inches and it gets those muscles along your scapula that are always getting tight or pinched. That's what's great about the wrist holes, you can adjust it to anywhere along your back. This thing is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic221979

customer_reviews.title: Super Nice Neck Massager.
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything about this. I had an MRI diagnosis of severe degenerative arthritis in my neck. My neck is a little stiff all the time but I am able to get around without medication and relatively easily. I purchased this product to enhance feeling better and it works great. Very nice massage, really loosens my neck well and easy to control. Easy to move around top of neck bottom, etc. As a bonus you can also use it on back, legs, etc. Super nice traveling case that can be used for anything. Really glad I own it.
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: It didn't last long before it stopped working. It's not as durable as I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Mari P

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice massager! I bought it after trying one that a coworker had. I wish this one could be used without being plugged in. The massage feels great, but you are tethered by a cord. The one my coworker had contained a rechargeable internal battery which allowed free movement and made it transportable. This seems well made and has a nice carrying bag with it.
customer_reviews.author: Heather C.

customer_reviews.title: Great for sore/stiff muscles
customer_reviews.text: Love love love with massager! I bought for back and neck pain that have been contributing to migraines and it has been helping loosen up neck and back in between chiropractor appointments. It’s allowed me to stretch out the time in between my appointments. I’ve also been using on my legs after working out and it helps after an intense leg day!! I love the heat feature and the different levels of intensity. I use this at least 3 days a week. My parents and brother have both started using as well. The only thing I would change is the outlet plug in- I wish it was wireless/chargeable. -unless it is and I haven’t read the description properly!
customer_reviews.author: Jillana

customer_reviews.title: Beware of friction burns
customer_reviews.text: Friction from the device caused layers of my skin to peel off. I basically have burns all over my upper back.
customer_reviews.author: Acind

customer_reviews.title: Nifty Massager!
customer_reviews.text: In the past, I've always had massagers that were stationary machines -- and heavy at that. This massager is so much better because it is flexible and easy to use. It will work on whatever body part you put it on, which is much more preferable to heavy machines. You can use it like a shawl for your neck, shoulders, and back -- with the ability of moving it around to whatever spot you need it to be. So easy to use! Unfortunately (or I should probably say "fortunately"), I've not had extensive need to use it since my purchase, but it has worked great for the amount I have used it. I would recommend trying it!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: So helpful for desk-job neck pain
customer_reviews.text: this has been an affordable and helpful device to loosen our necks and backs after long hours at the desk. It is definitely made for average sized necks though- if you are petite, you need to prop it up a bit to really get the nodes around your neck and shoulders correctly. It can be done, just a bit of fenaggling. :)
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: The product started off in an amazing way but very shortly it started malfunctioning. I hoped I could find a way to make it work but now it’s next to worthless. My advice: don’t buy this product and save your money for something that will work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Snell

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: It works! especially with home quarantine, I spend long hours with working online, my upper back and my cervical area experienced a lot of pain/strain. Thank God for this product! It affords me tons of relief. To maximize the effect, you have to use both hands to manipulate the massager which means you pretty much your activities will be limited while you are enjoying a great massage. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: JPS Aznar

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: Ripped the fabric within the first two minutes of use. I unzipped the cover to look and saw this broken plastic that would grab everytime it rotated against that direction. Also, the little bit I got to use it, I didn’t like it. It is large and awkward to use and the hard plastic heads are uncomfortable when it hits a bone. Doesn’t hold a candle to real human hands.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Kelly

customer_reviews.title: The best massager hands down!
customer_reviews.text: I personally suffer from chronic upper back and neck tension/pain. With that in mind, this is easily the best massager I’ve ever owned. I counted 6 traditional vibrators/massagers in my house before writing this review and I’m including my 2k massage chair! The key advantage is this massagers ability to reach problem areas of my back that I can now reach. The heating element is a plus along with the cigarette/auto adapter. As a side note I was introduced to this massager while visiting good friends over Christmas. He had bought this for his wife and she was raving about it. I tried it and was sold immediately. I had to have one and am so glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: D. Rod

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last
customer_reviews.text: Worked great at first. Lasted about a month before one side and heat stopped working. Also the cord is too short. Aside from that, it is great for pain relief.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi P.

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in March 2019. It has a 90 day warranty. Guess what? Right after the 90 days the product starts to not work properly but I would put it down and come back later and it would work. It’s now December and 2 screws have come loose and it won’t run. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: BAH

customer_reviews.title: Home Personal Masseuse
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife who suffers from chronic pain/arthritis in the neck and upper back. She has a chiropractor that she sees every 3 weeks, but she would love to see a masseuse once/week, but it is just not affordable to do so. She looked at this and said, "I like that it kneads and not vibrates" We ordered it. WE, (noticed that I said WE) both LOVE IT.. It feels like a masseuse that we can control, whether it is deep or light. It has really helped both of us relieve our pain and relax us. We recommend this highly. Thank you for offering such a great product at a great price. Mike and Lillian Downing, California
customer_reviews.author: Michael D.

customer_reviews.title: A Great Friend's Recommendation!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Resteck Neck Massager because a good friend recommended it. I took a bad spill on Christmas Day and effected my neck and shoulders for some time. My friend suggested I purchase the Resteck Neck Massager from Amazon because it had worked so well for her. Shazaam, she was right! It helped almost immediatley. The stiffness and soreness gradually subsided and did some good. I do advise that the first time you try it don't be tempted to use it too long, use it gradually in small bits of time. I love it, it is easy to use, once you get the hang of it!
customer_reviews.author: Cristina Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic! Absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one of these we bought because we love it so much -- need one for each of us. I have a different manufacturer version of this, but it was bulkier, the massage balls hurt, and it somehow heavier. This RESTECK is fabulous. Love that it comes with a convenient carry case. Easy to use wherever you need a great massage. Choice of heat or no heat and massage rotation direction. Great value. You'll want to make this a regular part of your end-of-day routine. And you're supporting a small U.S. business. Win-win.
customer_reviews.author: M. Woods

customer_reviews.title: wish I had done more research before buying.
customer_reviews.text: Just feels cheap. Stops and goes sometimes, makes crinkling noise as it turns , not nice material against skin.
customer_reviews.author: NicoleM

customer_reviews.title: Cheap production
customer_reviews.text: I received my item and was satisfied at first but I noticed when you apply a slight pressure the mechanics of the motors seems to have problems doing it’s rotations, and shortly after I noticed a sound that seems like a tiny broken piece of plastic on the inside of the rotation balls that I have to listen to every rotation. Do not spend money on this on just because it costs the most. The company is a rip off and is trying to get as much money as they can for a product that many other manufacturers on amazon sell cheaper and may even be better.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Wysochanski

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! I suffer fr chronic muscle pain thhanks to and inflammatory disease and the only thing that helps is massages. My husband got this for me hoping that it would help ease the pain. I started using it and it is amazing. I'm super picky with massagers because it never gets the rights spots but this one does and it's as gentle or firm as you want it. The straps help to place it exactly how you want it. It comes with a small back that fits in any little corner. I love it and thanks to this little machine I feel better and less painful. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Igsia D.

customer_reviews.title: It Works on Your Shoulders or on Top of Body, but not Beneath You
customer_reviews.text: I have lower-back pain along with other massage needs. Because I bought a massage machine for my feet and calf, I was hoping this belt can do the rest, on my legs, back, , neck, etc. I was very disappointed to find out that this product could only be used on top of body. It’s bulky and thick - one can not sit on sofa to be flat and comfortably against it without feeling pain from the protruding big balls, whether for the back or the neck. I am quite tolerable to pain, but I have to say that this product was just too much to lean against.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Not helpful, hurts my neck worse!
customer_reviews.text: This definitely wasn't for me. My neck isn't too bad to begin with, bought to relieve stress tension in neck after long days at work. This contraption made it way worse. I guess it works for a lot of people according to reviews, but tried it once and will never use again! Oh well goodbye $60!..
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: Five STARS
customer_reviews.text: I miss the days when you could get a massage in person, but that was pre pandemic era. These are the times we live in and must accept. I haven’t had a decent massage in ages it seems. I probably won’t be seeing my massage therapist for a really long time, and for safety reasons, I’d rather not! So I am glad I found this, I have had for about five months. Originally purchased for Christmas present, but I use it more so it’s pretty much mine. Hits all the spots and the fact that it heats up is a nice touch. I will be using every day till it breaks.
customer_reviews.author: Forever Filipina

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have been having neck and back pain for so long now that I decided to give this massager a try. Even though I have only had it for a few day now, but I am very very pleased with it. It is nice because I can adjust it and move it around to hit the spots that bother me the most. I am sure it will not solve all of the issues I am having, but it has definitely exceeded my expectations. Especially for this price.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Avoid if you are tall and want a strong massager
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in this purchase especially with all the positive reviews. I give it such a poor review for two reasons. 1. Weak motor. I’m a taller person and when I went to apply more pressure, I could hear the motor straining and it was much slower. 2. Short straps. Like I said, I’m taller and the straps are not an ideal length. It can make positioning the massager really awkward and difficult. I’ve used a homedics massager that was amazing and I chose this one because it looked extremely similar, was half the price, and had high reviews. I’m starting to learn that online reviews don’t mean a whole lot.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Zemaitis

customer_reviews.title: Hits the spot
customer_reviews.text: I lift weights regularly and have knots in my traps and around my shoulder blades that conventional chair massagers can't get to. This does. It hits the spots I need. You can make this massager lighter by not pressing down with your arms in the arm hoops or deep tissue by pushing down harder. Only negative I see is the arm hoops could be a little longer. I'm tall and my arms are bent. Would be more comfortable if they were longer - but not a big deal in the grand scheme of things. Would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: A Mother

customer_reviews.title: Left out important information
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this and was so disappointed to learn I can't use it because I have a pacemaker. It would have been nice to know that before I ordered. Now I have to go to the trouble of returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: The best personal masseur
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for 3+ months now and thus can say with confidence that this product is unbelievably awesome. My entire family uses its. Its hard enough for me and gently enough for my family. The heat feature is the icing on the cake. I use it almost everyday and like it so much that its kinda become a habit; I look forward to the evening massage sessions with this personal masseur. IMO, its not just a neck and back massager, its a whole body massager. I have also got awesome relief when using this on my sore muscles after strenuous workout sessions. In summary, this product is simply awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Julius

customer_reviews.title: It broke already, but I got a replacement pronto!
customer_reviews.text: Updated 2/27/19: Ted, the owner at Resteck, contacted me directly when my first massager broke, which I reported in my original review on Amazon. He apologized for the inconvenience and sent me a replacement unit. That's great customer service, and so far my new massager is working great so I'm updating my review accordingly. Previous review: It was a good massager -- though I slightly prefer the Naipo Shiatsu Massager since it gives a deeper massage -- but after just three months it no longer turns on. I press the power button and nothing happens, which means no massage 😞
customer_reviews.author: R. Justin Chan

customer_reviews.title: Great deep tissue massage!
customer_reviews.text: This neck massager really gets in deep tissue. Love the setting that reverses the motion. It definitely relief my pain all the way to the base of my head. It takes my pain (on scale of 1 to 10) from a 10 to a 2/3. Better than the chiropractor! Well with the money but it could have more umph making it last longer and keep the same speed for full 15 minutes. I usually can't take the whole time cause I get some sore, so I share a session with my wife.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer and happy with product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product a few months ago and have been using it rather regularly since. My wife uses it frequently too. It works as described and can be used to work on muscle tension outside of the standard uses. My wife actually uses it for her feet (maybe this isn’t safe) and as someone who struggles with knee pain and tightness in the major muscle groups above and below the knee, I’ve used it after runs to work those tissues. Definitely a good buy and would recommend it to someone looking for a good neck and back massager. For the price it probably can’t be beat but this is our first massager if it’s kind.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: In general I don't like things like massage chairs, etc. as I find they never hit quite right but this massager is pretty much perfect on my neck. It massages deeply without hurting and it's comfortable to use, unlike stick massagers where your whole arm is vibrating and you have to contort your body oddly to get all portions of your back. With this massager you can just turn it on, put it where you want it (works great on the back as well), tuck your hands into the very comfortable loops and just ... relax. I don't need it all the time, but every once in a while I really do and then it's a godsend.
customer_reviews.author: HB

customer_reviews.title: This item is excellent
customer_reviews.text: This is a very effective neck and back massager which we use both at home and when travelling in our RV. The handles make it easy to deliver just the right pressure to the right location and the alternating balls help all muscles get the massage thy need. The heat feature is also a plus as is the option of AC or cigarette lighter power. Would be greater if it had rechargeable batteries so we could use it unteathered but it is well worth the price regardless. We've recommended this to family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen J. Beede

customer_reviews.title: Too Strong for Small Body Frames
customer_reviews.text: It's a little bulky to use and it's REALLY deep massage to the point where it actually hurts. The pressure is up to you since you control how hard you pull down on the straps, but even with the slightest pressure, the rolling balls dig too far into my muscles. My boyfriend (who is 6' 2" and has a much bigger frame) likes it so I won't return it, but I won't be using it myself. I think it's a neat design and seems good quality and I like the bag it comes with, so i'm giving it 3 stars. Haven't really used the heating function.
customer_reviews.author: Christeenduh

customer_reviews.title: Best Massager Ever
customer_reviews.text: During these crazy past few months, I am not sure what I would've done without this! The whole family used it daily during quarantine to help with back pain and muscle tension. It works so well that the next day I am sore from use! I appreciate how it gets those really tough knots and has the heat feature. The first one I received had some issues and I was sent another one that works amazingly! Exceptional customer service and communication from seller as well. I highly recommend this product and would give it a million stars if I could!
customer_reviews.author: Kara Butcher

customer_reviews.title: Life changing.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this massager for nearly 4 months now, and let me tell you, it's changed my life. I get frequent knots in my shoulders and neck even with daily stretching exercises, which causes terrible tension headaches. Whenever I feel them starting, I get the massager out and stop the headaches before they can start. I also have sacroiliac joint disfunction (hip/lower back pain), and this is the only thing other than a heating pad that I've found to give me any real relief. I love it and recommend it to anyone with chronic pain that can be eased by massage. It's given me so many more functional days. It's amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: Impressed so far
customer_reviews.text: I'm so far very happy with this product. It seems very well-built, with strong stitching and comfortable materials. I've tried other massagers that feel much cheaper. It's easy to use up and down my whole neck and back and helps work out tight muscles. The carrying case is very nice quality in comparison to the other brands I've seen. I probably can't speak to the durability of this item, as I'm sure I use it less often than average. But it seems sturdy enough that I don't think I'll have any issues with it in the future. I'm really happy I chose this one.
customer_reviews.author: O'mally

customer_reviews.title: Adaptable Massager
customer_reviews.text: This is a great massager! It can be used in a variety of ways (neck, back, stomach, legs, etc.) - you just have to be creative. I also appreciate the construction of the item. It feels solid and like it will last for a long time. I only have two pieces of criticism: (1) people with long arms might have a bit trouble getting their hands properly through the loops and (2) for my neck, I feel like the massager doesn't really "cup" it perfectly (but that might just be me). In general, for the price and for what it is, this is an excellent personal massager. You won't regret buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Boris

product_meta.title: RESTECK- Massagers for Neck and Back with Heat
feature_bullets: ALLEVIATE ACUTE PAINS & MUSCLE SORENESS: Save your precious time and hard earned money with a RESTECK shiatsu massager kit. Minimize acute pains that would hinder your every move and enjoy life to the fullest. Ease neck stiffness, eliminate constant fatigue, soothe aching muscles and promote proper blood circulation.

ENJOY A DEEP MASSAGE EVEN ON THE GO: One of the greatest things about this shiatsu massager is its portable nature. Enjoy a rejuvenating massage even on the go with our massager pillow. Great for road trips, traveling, camping, car use, the office and more. It comes in a wonderful leather pouch for hassle free carrying and storage

CONTROL HEAT & STIMULATION TO YOUR NEEDS: This shiatsu massager has 4 buttons for facilitated use. Regulate the heat to achieve the coziest massage ever depending on your needs. Choose the right stimulation mode. Lay back and relax. The clever bidirectional kneading nodes ensure endless comfort and massaging pleasure

MASSAGE EVERY INCH OF YOUR BODY: Explore the multipurpose nature of our shiatsu kneading massager pillow today. Works miracles all over your body from head to toe! Use on your neck, shoulder, back and legs. Great for your glutes, calves and even your feet. Enjoy a full body and stimulating massage in the comfort of your living room!

GET THIS THERAPY MASSAGER WITH CONFIDENCE: Satisfying our customers is our top priority. That is why this massager is backed by our LIFETIME warranty policy! In the unlikely event of ever having any issues with it. Get your shiatsu kneading massager pillow today or make a thoughtful gift to a dear friend or beloved family member!
